architectural_notes: Prefer relative URLs in <head> metadata (canonical, OG tags, asset URLs) to remain domain-agnostic; when an absolute URL is required, standardize on verithos.io.

existing_features.title: Update `frontend/index.html` `<head>` metadata so that all URLs use relative paths where valid, and use the absolute base domain `verithos.io` only where a relative URL is not appropriate (e.g., canonical and Open Graph page URL). Replace any remaining `verithos.com` references accordingly.
